page.title: 06LYNSEY'S WEEKEND.
page.content: Most men on Saturday and Sunday play football in the park on the pitch.When I have spare time I go to play with my friend. When I am in school at playtime I mostly play rounders.People where I live walk their dogs. I do the gardening. My dad mostly watches T.V. On Saturday morning I go swimming. For tea I go to the White House. On Sunday morning I go to Sunday school in Calcoed chapel. I go for Sunday lunch to a pub called the Crook. Sometimes I go roller-skating with my friend. The games I play are hopscotch,british-bulldogs,netball and rounders.
